Name: Blue Pepper

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: My wife and I had one of the loveliest meals of our lives here last night. The food was deliciously inventive and beautifully presented. The small space gives it a familial feel and the attentive staff are courteous and thoughtful. The star …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text:
Very good and tiical Indonesian food. A friend who lived there recommended me this restaurant because it has real Indonesian food.
Very well presented dishes, great taste, normal size, you will not feel very …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: A really nice place to discover the Indonesian cuisine - variety of plates that are adopted in way (from my point of view) to European taste and are still keeping the richness and uniqueness of their cuisine: some plates impressed us by the …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: I am a bit torn about the ratings to give. As someone who is familiar with Indonesian cusine, I think the taste authenticity is lacking, the spices and taste is adapted for the European palate. Presentation style, was done in the number of …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text:
Highly recommend this place. Cool setting and excellent service for some wonderful food.
We had the mainly meat based rijsttafel and found it to be delightful from start to finish. The accompanying wines work well and are great value for money.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: The food is exceptional and if you wait for the desert it will blown your mind / mouth. It's super beautiful modern Indonesian well priced for a fancy date. Expect to invest 50 euro on a menu you will not forget

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: A great Indonesian restaurant with a twist. The quality of the food is excellent and worth the price. Wine selection is also impressive. I'd recommend to order the sultan rijstaffel for dinner

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: What an experience!! This cozy and small gem is truly a different and exceptional Rijs Tafel. Amazing blends of flavor and color, some expected dishes and huge surprises make for a very delicious and special meal. Not cheap but better than …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Yummy and exciting. No food you eat every day. Good tastes good wine to suit the food. Good work

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Fresh, out-of-the-box and delicious. First time I've ever ate a grasshopper. The tasting menu is highly recommended.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Very good taste food and the service is also well. Leisure environment for family, firends, even for alome. All these makes me want to go next time.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Really nice and exciting food. Beautiful resturent and the staff is nice and friendly. It is a bit pricy but worth the money.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: What a foodie destination! We were AWED! Don't be turned away at the price, worth every bit and more. So much originality, kudos to the chef and all the staff. Get the wine pairing.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text:
We just had a wonderful experience in this quiet and elegant little restaurant.
The kind waiter will lead you along the journey to discover the true contemporary indonesian taste. Relaxing atmosphere.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Outstanding Indonesian food and really attentive service. We wanted a light dinner and only ordered the rendang and prawns ala carte. The chef felt our meal was incomplete without some vegetables so he included some complimentary stir fried …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: If your an average Joe like myself, do not go here it is way too expensive ! Two set menus €60 and €65 we were able to get a la carte and just get a main course which was €24 per person for a small sized meal. The food was lovely and the staff was great but was well overpriced

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: The extremely professional staff made sure our rijsttafel included plenty of vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options. The meal itself was incredibly fresh, beautifully presented, and absolutely delicious. The server and host came to …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: The satay is absolutely out of this world. The rest of the food was good too and it's a nice cozy atmosphere where you can actually have a conversation.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Another great tasting experience at Blue Pepper complete with wine flight. Because I couldn't eat all that was offered on the meat and fish set menu I opted for the vegan tasting menu. This was equally good and I was surprised by how much …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: We came here for valentines day and opted for the taster menu.  Both of us agreed this may have been the best meal either of us have had for years.  Staff were very friendly and helpful.  My only negative point is that I'd have to come all the way to amsterdam to enjoy this meal again, otherwise we'd be regular customers!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Among the best Asian restaurants we have been to, including the best in Singapore and Hong Kong. The spicy recipes are left intact, without 'adaptation' to European tastes, which makes it an authentic Asian experience. We had 1 fish and …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: There are good meals, and then there are great meals you'll remember for a long time. Our experience at Blue Pepper was one we'll remember for years to come. We ordered the chef's menu and it was all fantastic. Great ambiance, excellent service and attention to detail. Would recommend it without hesitation.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Stylish interior and friendly staff. 4 course tasting menu was full of surprises and kept me entertained for the whole evening. A special mention for the dessert which featured an 'electric flower' that was a never-before experience for me. …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: We had a group dinner here to celebrate a birthday. There were a lot of vegans in the group and everybody was taken care of by the restaurant team perfectly. In fact a full vegan menu was offered to us. The place is cosy with luxe chairs …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: We came in for an early dinner after a long day of walking around. This was one of our favorite spots in Amsterdam! Great selection of dishes and drinks. First time trying bitterballen and it was great. SO got the combination hutspot and I got the oven dish (cauliflower, beef, cheese, mashed potatoes). We loved our experience here!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: This was the most interesting meal I had over five days in Amsterdam. Highly recommend if you're sick of Dutch food and want something different. Also really appreciate how they worked hard to accommodate us on a busy night with no reservations.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Enjoyed a fantastic meal while vacationing in Amsterdam. Was able to try the vegetarian and meat selection menus. Enjoyed watching one of our table guests enjoy the grasshopper appetizer while I ate a chicken wonton.The palate cleanser before dessert was one of the most intriguing dishes of the evening.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Delicious Indonesian food, nice exotic cocktail and friendly service with smile. The food is the main attraction though and I guess the place is justifiably a well known local address for the best in authentic Indonesian cooking in the Dutch capital.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: We had a delightful and delicious dinner at Blue Pepper last Saturday to celebrate a milestone birthday. We highly recommend it for a wonderful rijstafel!  It was memorable in so many ways, starting with the food, which was amazing!  We all …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Outstanding Indonesian food and service. Very helpful in providing us halal choices for a full-course dinner. One of the best restaurants in Amsterdam in our experience.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Very creative and original project with modern twists on traditional Indonesian food. The results are outstanding. Also beautifully designed interior and charming service to round off a complete evening.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text:
Fantastic little restaurant with an excellent menu!
My girlfriend and I went there for dinner and we had such an amazing experience. We took the 3 course menu with accompanying wine. The dishes were really …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Went here with my father and brother for our first night of a weekend trip. The food was lovely, with varying levels of spice, they were flexible with changing the menus around, and the service was great. We discovered a mistake on the …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Not bad, but I have eaten so many times so much better `rijsttafels` for much less, that we left this restaurant feeling ripped off. EUR 46.50 per person for the classic `rijsttafel` for 3 salty courses and 1 sweet course, so set dishes in …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: The most interesting meal we had in a long time. Spciy food, but with unfamiliar spices. Soft-shell crab with a tangy dressing opened our eyes and ears, and wild chicken took us to another level of complex slow-cooked curry. Flawless service and food explanations throughout the evening.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: We had looked forward to try this out for a while, being fans of Indonesian cousine and knowing this is a modern interpretation thereof. Except from a couple of fish preparations, very good and unusual, we found basically the same classics …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: I reserved a table for 2 on a rainy Monday night for my boyfriend's birthday. He had been craving a good Indonesian dinner and I wanted something special and unique for his special day. Blue Pepper did not disappoint. Even though we were …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: An outstanding example of an Asian kitchen. This team has both the quality of food and service right. After being asked if we wanted our food (Asian) spicy or mild, they set out to produce course after course of little wonders, bringing the …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Fantastic restaurant we discovered on a recent trip to Amsterdam. From mild to very spicy, an amazing range of dishes served in one beautiful meal. Just enjoy the experience!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Exquisite food. Our favourite Indonesian in Amsterdam. The spicy prawn curry tastes exactly like we had in Indonesia. Every bit worth the price.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: After reading reviews about the Blue Pepper we decided to make a reservation during our stay in Amsterdam. Upon arrival it seems unassuming and the staff were very friendly. You are given a lot of space to dine which we did quite like, but …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Delicious food and atmosphere with a pleasant combination of locals with families and some from our neighbourhood. The classic rijsttafel is a lot of food and wickedly they ask if you want more, which is actually possible. Ask for seconds of the beef curry!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Best meal with pairing wines that we have had in a long time. We had the vegetarian option and the meat option, both were excellent. The ambience and camaraderie made a truly memorable evening. Thank you

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Wow. Discovered this place by chance. What a find. Amazing Indonesian tasting menu that included everything from grasshopper to electric blue jelly. Probably not for the unadventurous as there's no choice beyond meat menu or vegetarian menu but if you're willing to go with it you won't be disappointed.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: A stand out in the culinary world. Tasting menu had the best dish progression and timing of any menu I have had, each dish complimenting the last and the next, the portion size was perfect and left me happily struggling to finish the last …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Scenic and romantic dinner cruise on a luxury boat with a surprisingly high quality of fresh cooked Asian food, all cooked in front of us and lovingly presented. At some point when the boat sails on the big river it is truly thrilling. …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: We took the Blue Pepper dinner cruise in December. We were spending a weekend in Amsterdam and it was raining quite a lot. The choice was between sitting in our hotel room and getting soaked trying to see Amsterdam on foot. So we chose the …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Had a fabulous Indonesian dinner at this charming small restaurant. Packed but very personal service. Food is delicious and the surprises alone are well worth a visit. Highly recommended.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: We booked Blue Pepper dinner cruise for our anniversary. Just a few couples on a picture-perfect boat. Fine Asian food with a variety of tastes ending with an unusual and thrilling dessert. Serenely elegant and exclusive.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: I went to blue pepper for my father's birthday and they blew my expectations. Food was well though out, with carefully selected fresh ingredients. Great mixture of Indonesian flavors and modern cusine.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Great food - a real dining experience with here and there some lovely surprises! I've been there before, but just found out they have a pre-theater dinner and so it's possible to reserve at 5:30pm and still get to the theater on time! Highly recommended!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Best Indonesian in Amsterdam. We have eaten at several Amsterdam Indonesian restaurants and this is the best. Great atmosphere, attention to detail, and great flavors. Not a fast dinner, so bring someone you want to spend some time with.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Picked up the rijsttafel for 2 this evening. It was fantastic! All my senses were awakened. So great to have this in these difficult times. Friday Date Nite was a great success!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Very impressive and innovative dishes! Love the fact that they divided the whole "rijsttafel" into multiple courses. Great service to top it all off. Absolutely worth a visit and we will go back when we are in town again.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text:
Excellent food, the menu is well worth its price and offers a wide variety to try everything. Rarely eaten so well made vegan food
Staff very friendly and accommodating, perfect wine recommendations.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Scenic and gourmet tour of Amsterdam on their beautiful antique boat. Our group was thoroughly charmed by the exquisite food and soulful service. The early to late evening timing gave us the chance to see the city both in daylight and after dark, nicely lit up.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: For people mostly used to Vietnamese and Korean cooking among the more recent Asian kitchens to come to the US, this kitchen is different and the food more curry-like and heavier. A collection of delicious, small dishes that make up the …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Recently tried. They have an outstanding creative Indonesian kitchen, you cannot compare the menu with any other Indo place in town. Chic and classy with plenty of high-end (expensive) wines, but cooking and service at a level matched by few other Asian joints in town. Reserve for the special occasion.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Super tasty food. Lovely hosting and great portion sizes. Some innovative  Indonesian dishes and flavours. Well priced so a real gem all-round.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Top quality food and warm, friendly service. Also an extensive and well-priced wine list. Overall ambience/quality/price all in perfect balance.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Heard from cruise passenger that Indonesia Food is great in Amsterdam, recommended by Hyatt staff, the fiod is tasty. Especially the deasert. Expensive but worth a try. Average 69 euro per person.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Great quality food served in this contemporary restaurant. Service was excellent although the menu was a little expensive compared to most Indonesian restaurants (even in Amsterdam), but you do get what you pay for.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Very nice experience, the menu is very tasty and the service is excelent and kind.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: We all had a great time at this restaurant. The individual dishes made for a tastefully meal. A delightful last day in Amsterdam. Thank you Blue Pepper.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: This restaurant does not look much from the outside but my taste buds really came alive with the best Indonesian food I have ever tasted. Kevin our waiter explained all the different options and nothing was too much hassle. Will definitely be going back on my next trip to Amsterdam

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Delicious! Highly recommended. We did the more traditional rijsttafel and loved the variety/selection. Definitely will go back the next time I'm in Amsterdam!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text:
A very special place for Indonesian food. We ate 2 fix meal menus.
A lot of good quality food .
We stayed for 3 hours! …

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: The best south Asian cuisine I have ever had!! The peanut sauce, the chilli and everything, just perfect!! The staff will explain every dish so that you can have the best experience.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Fantastic dining on Blue Pepper's luxury boat. Atmosphere on the boat and through the Amsterdam canals at night is simoly magical. A superb 4-course meal was served with wines.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: North Americans best call ahead, be posh, or avoid. We walked in, were ignored, and when we asked about a table, the response was scoffing. I'm sure the food is nice but I doubt it's good enough to make up for that approach to service

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: I have eaten in Indonesia (Java, Bali, Flores, Lomboq etc) and many Toko's in the Netherlands, but this experience is completely different and also the taste is not genuine. I will not say it is bad food, but the amount your spending can be 50% less for REAL Indonesian food.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Very special and romantic dinner cruise. The combination of great food, wines and night-time sailing experience of Amsterdam is truly unique.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: We found this small restaurant after reading the reviews on Der Feinschmecker. Amazing food in a beautifully designed place. Don't forget to ask for the 'special' exotic items on the menu!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Small and very welcoming restaurant with unusually high standard of cooking. Nice wine list and Indonesian beers.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Wow what exciting and fancy food. We walked in but they gave us a very nice sofa table. You can spend hours eating unusual things here!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Fascinating small restaurant with top quality Asian food. Great introduction to rice table at an attractive price. Totally enjoyed.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Novel experience with Indonesian food and wine. We didn't know a nice German Riesling went so well with the spicy flavours.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Very cosy, relaxed restaurant with great service. Every dish of the tasting menu was beautifully presented and delicious. A modern take on Indonesian food. Will be back.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Been in NL for three months. This is one of the best spots I've had the pleasure of eating at here in Amsterdam. Presentation is excellent and the food passes with flying colors.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Creative and fresh, sophisticated variations on classic Indonesian dishes, authentic spice combinations. Fabulous dinner here!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Lovely restaurant, delicious food and wonderful service. We chose to go with the matching wines offered with our banquet and were not disappointed. Highly recommended.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Average Indonesian food. We got the "tradition" tasting menu and it was below my expectations. I didn't think the food was that authentic and portions were small.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Decent food for the price and an okay selection. No full bar - only a selection of drinks to make. Friendly staff and on top of things.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Little beauty of a restaurant with museum-like art and mood lighting. Food is equally charming, sometimes spicy, and full of intense flavours.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Great place for fine dining. Good service with friendly staff. Would recommend a reservation but luckily we managed to get a table without one.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Some weird and wacky interpretations but all  tasty and interesting. Excellent service but you do need deep pockets. The decor and toilets are also rather tired.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Phenomenally good service and equally exciting food. Quite out of the ordinary items on the menu. Enjoyed every bit!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Extremely good and exciting food, best restaurant visit in years. Tasty, fun and interesting flavors. Don't miss it.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Delicious food in a small intimate space filled with fine modern art. A very pleasant evening, thanks to the food and excellent service!

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Superb food and wines. We had the mini rijsttafel with 2 glasses of an Italian red and felt very satisfied.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Food was actually pretty good overall but many of the dishes were way too exotic for my tastes. There's no way I'll be willing to eat grasshoppers.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: I've come to the conclusion that fine dining and Asian (Indonesian in this case) food, for me, don't really go together. Nonetheless, great food and service.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: Great fusion food. The inclusion of thai and indonesian into menu was authentic enough. Great wine. Cosy abt 25 tables.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: It was a very pleasant dining experience at Blue Pepper.  Everything on the menu was delicious.  It was a bit pricey but it was worth every penny.  I would come back here and definitely recommend this place.

Name: Blue Pepper
Review Text: A nice place to try different meals. Dont forget to ask what you are gonna eat before they serve it :))) the single negtaive is the narrowness of the Restaurant......
